channel.title: Need admins and mods for my server!
channel.description:
you wanna be a mod or an admin or forum mod or admin
THEN LETS START!
a. what would you like to be? b. what is your servers i.p so i check it out? c. do you have hamachi? (only way to connect to my server) d. have any toturial links u made? e. will you obey all the rules and encourage friends to join?
thats it
tip: if you have good coding expirience and good codes for more updates on server u get higher chance of being admin on server AND forum admin
please apply you wont be sorry :D ;) ;)
